page.title: 17EDUCATION
page.content: {Woking Sixth Form College } Today a friend and I went to interview Mr Thomas, the history teacher at the college. There are about 700 pupils at the college and 60 teachers. The college opened in 1977. The staff don't use corporal punishment. They punish pupils by suspending them. At the college the pupils have a choice of 32 subjects for advanced level and 33 subjects for ordinary level G.C.E. {Kingfield First and Middle School} Mrs Flood, the headmistress, has worked in the school for four years. Mrs Flood particularly likes our school because she finds the children lively and full of ideas. As head teacher Mrs Flood teaches, writes reports, organises meetings and timetables.
